hymn.title: From the beachhead in our spirit

layout.singingstanza: From the beach -- head in our spir -- it To our mind, e -- mo -- tion, will. Christ will spread through all our be -- ing And our ves -- sel whol -- ly fill. He will cast out all re -- bel -- lion, Change our dark -- ness in -- to light. Sa -- tan's king -- dom will be swal -- lowed, And Christ will reign with might. This is the Lord's re -- cov -- er -- y, This is His ver -- y best! Broth -- ers, give the Lord the ground in you Till His king -- dom's man -- i -- fest.

lyrics.stanza: From the beachhead in our spirit To our mind, emotion, will. Christ will spread through all our being And our vessel wholly fill. He will cast out all rebellion, Change our darkness into light. Satan's kingdom will be swallowed, And Christ will reign with might. This is the Lord's recovery, This is His very best! Brothers, give the Lord the ground in you Till His kingdom's manifest.
